attributes.action: Order the Prime Minister to break down the £22billion black hole
attributes.additional_details: The electorate have a right to know how the details of the £22b black hole, as this has been constantly referred to by the PM and the rest of the cabinet, with no actual evidence to corroborate the claim
attributes.background: The Prime Minister and Chancellor should give a detailed breakdown of the £22billion black hole, they insist they inherited from the previous government

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Investigate the claims of £22 Billion black hole: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700170
